Class SmartClientConfig

extends Object
    Houses configuration for the smart client.

    • Method Detail

      • getVipAddresses

        public String getVipAddresses()

      • setVipAddresses

        public void setVipAddresses(String vipAddresses)
        Set the comma-separated list of VIP addresses (hosts and ports) for load balancing. When a request uses one of these addresses, it will be replaced by the load balancer with a selected host (data services node) from the LB's host list.

      • getInitialNodes

        public List<com.netflix.loadbalancer.Server> getInitialNodes()

      • getInitialNodesString

        public String getInitialNodesString()

      • setInitialNodes

        public void setInitialNodes(List<com.netflix.loadbalancer.Server> initialNodes)
        Set the initial list of data services nodes in the ViPR cluster. These nodes will be queried at regular intervals to get the full current list of active nodes.

      • getUser

        public String getUser()

      • setUser

        public void setUser(String user)
        Set the user to use when querying for the full list of active nodes

      • getSecret

        Set the user's secret key when querying nodes

        public void setPollProtocol(String pollProtocol)
        Sets the protocol to use when polling for active nodes (http or https).

      • getPollInterval

        public int getPollInterval()

      • setPollInterval

        public void setPollInterval(int pollInterval)
        Set the interval in seconds to wait between queries for active nodes. Defaults to 120 seconds (2 minutes).

      • getTimeout

        public int getTimeout()

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout threshold (in milliseconds) when querying for active nodes. Defaults to 5000ms (5 seconds).
